abstract: University of Cape Town in South Africa decides to remove statue of British imperialist Cecil Rhodes following protests that statue represents institutional racism.
lead_paragraph: The University of Cape Town decided Wednesday to remove a statue of the British imperialist Cecil Rhodes, which has set off protests by students who say it symbolizes an institutional racism that prevails in the country.

headline.main: South Africa: University to Remove Statue of a Colonial-Era Leader
headline.print_headline: Africa; South Africa: University to Remove Statue of a Colonial-Era Leader

snippet: The University of Cape Town decided Wednesday to remove a statue of the British imperialist Cecil Rhodes, which has set off protests by students who say it symbolizes an institutional racism that prevails in the country.
